name: Frozen Retreat
description: Summon an ancient portal, which arms after 1.5 seconds.  When triggered the enemy is teleported to you, immobilized for 3 seconds, and dealt 1799 Frost Damage.  An ally in the portal can activate the Icy Escape synergy, teleporting them to you and granting them Major Expedition, increasing their Movement Speed by 30% for 8 seconds.  You can have up to 3 Frozen Retreats active at a time.
effectLines: Grants allies in the area a synergy that teleports them to you and grants them increased Movement Speed.
coefDescription: Summon an ancient portal, which arms after 1.5 seconds.  When triggered the enemy is teleported to you, immobilized for 3 seconds, and dealt $1 Frost Damage.  An ally in the portal can activate the Icy Escape synergy, teleporting them to you and granting them Major Expedition, increasing their Movement Speed by 30% for 8 seconds.  You can have up to 3 Frozen Retreats active at a time.
